name: Wolfo
description:
Wolfo is a  VR game where you have a cute animal companion to help you find puzzle pieces spread throughout the environment!

Aim with your head and use the Right Trigger to tell Wolfo where to go.

Teleport with the Grip Buttons 

Tap left or right on the thumbpads to snap left or right

https://youtu.be/a5vBYjz1kRM
